channel.title: Help with Zelda: Majora's mask?
channel.description:
I need help getting all the glass bottles. I'm in the part of the game where you have to get the Zora eggs from the Pirate Fortress, but I only have two glass bottles and hate making trips back and forth out of the place..
Any suggestions?

item.title: Help with Zelda: Majora's mask?
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

[quote=“Squigglyo, post:4, topic:252600”]bah real men dont use walkthroughs… i beat this with all the masks 100%.

Awesome game, but doesnt even come close to Ocarina of Time[/quote]

Iv beat ocarina at least 4 times lol

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Zelda: Majora's mask?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

You get one from the near the zora cape, where you use a hookshot to get up a waterfall, then race some beaver thing and win. Don’t remember where any others are.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Zelda: Majora's mask?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

You could of googled Zelda Major’s mask walk through…

That was actually the only LoZ i completed, and i didn’t even get all the masks, i defeated Majora as normal link…

Years since i played on it, i can’t remember shit, apart from where you have to use your bow and arrow to kill all the po’s killing the cows for those people that own the pub, i was stuck on that bit for ages.

Read full topic
